articles.title: Stock Market Live: Which companies will gain from logistics policy? ACC-Ambuja, Deepak Fert, GHCL in focus... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: European markets ended lower amid growth fears, expectations for further rate hikes and continued volatility in the energy market weighed on stocks. Stoxx 600 closed 1.6% lower, FTSE 100 was down 0.6%, DAX slipped 1.7% and CAC 40 fell 1.3%. The British pound …

articles.title: Real Madrid extend perfect start with derby win against Atletico Madrid - European round-up - Sky Sports
articles.description: A clinical Real Madrid extended their perfect start to the La Liga season when they beat city rivals Atletico 2-1 at the Metropolitano on Sunday.
articles.content:
A clinical Real Madrid extended their perfect start to the La Liga season when they beat city rivals Atletico 2-1 at the Metropolitano on Sunday.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: European Union moves to cut funding to Hungary for undermining democracy - Global News
articles.description: The EU says Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has been undermining democracy as well as restricting the rights of migrants, gays and women during more than a decade in power.
articles.content: The European Union executive recommended on Sunday suspending some 7.5 billion euros in funding for Hungary over corruption, the first such case in the 27-nation bloc under a new sanction meant to be… [+2775 chars]
